data.comment: The match has started at Selhurst Park.
Crystal Palace to take a throw-in in Everton territory.
In the minute 1, Kevin Friend awards the away team a throw-in.
Crystal Palace have been awarded a corner by Kevin Friend.
Kevin Friend signals a free kick to Everton in their own half.
In the minute 5, Crystal Palace awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Crystal Palace in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Everton in their own half.
Kevin Friend signals a free kick to Everton.
Abdoulaye Doucoure gets his shot on target but fails to score for Everton.
In the minute 10, Goal! Dominic Calvert-Lewin gives Everton a 0-1 lead in London.
That's a fine assist from Seamus Coleman.
Throw-in for Everton in the half of Crystal Palace.
In the minute 14, Crystal Palace are coming forward and Tyrick Mitchell gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Everton goal kick.
Throw-in for Everton at Selhurst Park.
In the minute 15, Throw-in Crystal Palace.
Corner awarded to Crystal Palace.
Can Crystal Palace get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Everton's half?
In the minute 17, It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
Wilfried Zaha (Crystal Palace) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Kevin Friend signals a Crystal Palace throw-in in Everton's half.
In the minute 20, Corner awarded to Everton.
Kevin Friend signals a throw-in for Everton, close to Crystal Palace's area.
Can Everton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Crystal Palace's half?
Everton's Lucas Digne gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Crystal Palace defender.
In the minute 22, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Tyrick Mitchell.
In London a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Tyrick Mitchell has recovered and rejoins the match in London.
In the minute 23, Wilfried Zaha (Crystal Palace) has received a first yellow card.
Everton awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 24, Ball safe as Everton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ball safe as Crystal Palace is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Crystal Palace in their own half.
In the minute 26, Crystal Palace have been awarded a corner by Kevin Friend.
Goal! Crystal Palace draw level to 1-1 through a Cheikhou Kouyate header.
Andros Townsend instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 28, Kevin Friend awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Everton close to the penalty box.
Crystal Palace awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 29, Free kick for Crystal Palace in the half of Everton.
Corner awarded to Crystal Palace.
James McCarthy (Crystal Palace) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 30, Everton drive upfield and Richarlison gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Crystal Palace defender.
Everton have been awarded a corner by Kevin Friend.
Kevin Friend signals a free kick to Crystal Palace in their own half.
In the minute 32, Kevin Friend signals a free kick to Everton in their own half.
Free kick for Everton in their own half.
Throw-in for Everton in the half of Crystal Palace.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Crystal Palace at Selhurst Park.
Everton to take a throw-in in Crystal Palace territory.
Kevin Friend blows against Crystal Palace's Wilfried Zaha for offside.
In the minute 36, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick Crystal Palace.
Everton have been awarded a penalty in London...
In the minute 40, Goal! Richarlison gives Everton a 1-2 lead from the penalty spot.
Kevin Friend signals a Everton throw-in in Crystal Palace's half.
Everton awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 44, Everton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Crystal Palace in the half of Everton.
Kevin Friend awards Everton a goal kick.
In the minute 45, 4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Crystal Palace have a goal kick.
Crystal Palace will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Everton.
In London Everton drive forward through James Rodriguez. His shot is on target but it's saved.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 45, At Selhurst Park, James McArthur has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Can Crystal Palace get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Everton's half?
Crystal Palace to take a throw-in in Everton territory.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Crystal Palace in the half of Everton.
Crystal Palace are in shooting range from this free kick.
Eberechi Eze (Crystal Palace) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 49, Free kick Crystal Palace.
Free kick for Everton in their own half.
Kevin Friend signals a Everton throw-in in Crystal Palace's half.
In the minute 51, Everton have been awarded a corner by Kevin Friend.
In London Everton attack through Dominic Calvert-Lewin. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Crystal Palace at Selhurst Park.
In the minute 52, Corner awarded to Crystal Palace.
Eberechi Eze of Crystal Palace gets in a strike, but is off target.
Kevin Friend awards Everton a goal kick.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Crystal Palace in their own half.
Everton have been awarded a corner by Kevin Friend.
In the minute 58, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Kevin Friend signals a free kick to Everton in their own half.
Joel Ward is booked for the home team.
It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
In the minute 60, Kevin Friend signals a free kick to Crystal Palace.
Richarlison (Everton) gets a yellow card.
Throw-in Everton.
In the minute 62, Corner awarded to Crystal Palace.
Can Crystal Palace get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Everton's half?
In London a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 65, Cheikhou Kouyate (Crystal Palace) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Everton have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 66, Ball safe as Everton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
James Rodriguez (Everton) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Everton.
In the minute 67, Goal kick for Crystal Palace at Selhurst Park.
Free kick for Crystal Palace in the half of Everton.
Crystal Palace push forward at Selhurst Park and Wilfried Zaha gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Everton defence.
In the minute 71, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Crystal Palace close to the penalty box.
Crystal Palace have been awarded a corner by Kevin Friend.
Eberechi Eze (Crystal Palace) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 74, Throw-in for Everton in the half of Crystal Palace.
Can Everton capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
The home team replace Eberechi Eze with Michy Batshuayi.
In the minute 76, Gylfi Sigurdsson is on a sub for Andre Gomes for Everton.
Crystal Palace awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Everton in their own half.
In the minute 80, Kevin Friend signals a Everton throw-in in Crystal Palace's half.
Everton to take a throw-in in Crystal Palace territory.
In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 82, Crystal Palace make their second substitution with Christian Benteke replacing Jordan Ayew.
Everton's Allan breaks free at Selhurst Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Crystal Palace goal kick.
In the minute 84, Everton have been awarded a corner by Kevin Friend.
Kevin Friend signals a free kick to Crystal Palace in their own half.
Throw-in for Crystal Palace in the half of Everton.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick Everton.
In the minute 86, The away team have replaced James Rodriguez with Alex Iwobi. This is the second substitution made today by Carlo Ancelotti.
In the minute 88, Kevin Friend signals a free kick to Crystal Palace.
Jairo Riedewald is replacing James McArthur for the home team.
Everton have a goal kick.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in London.
Everton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Everton in the half of Crystal Palace.
Throw-in for Crystal Palace at Selhurst Park.
Free kick for Crystal Palace in their own half.
Crystal Palace to take a throw-in in Everton territory.
Everton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-2.
Tom Davies is replacing Richarlison for the away team.
